content.text:
# 2010 Polsat Warsaw Open – Singles

Alexandra Dulgheru
| runner   =  Zheng Jie
| score    = 6–3, 6–4
| draw     = 30
| seeds    = 8
| after_name = WTA Poland Open
| after_year = 2021
| type     = singles doubles
}}
Alexandra Dulgheru was the defending champion, and won in the final 6–3, 6–4 against Zheng Jie.
Seeds
The top two seeds received a bye into the second round.
Caroline Wozniacki (quarterfinals, retired due to injured ankle)
#  Elena Dementieva (second round)

#  Marion Bartoli (first round)
#  Zheng Jie (final)

#  Melanie Oudin (first round)
}}
